00165 //----------------------------------------------------------
00166 GrTextureBase::GrTextureBase( const UPath& name, unsigned int bindTarget, EFORMAT format,
00167                                                           Flags flags, ETEXTURETYPE type )
00168 : _name( name )
00169 , _glHandle( 0 )
00170 , _bindTarget( bindTarget )
00171 , _flags( flags )
00172 , _glMinFilter( ( flags & kNoMipMap ) ? GL_NEAREST : GL_NEAREST_MIPMAP_NEAREST )
00173 , _glMagFilter( GL_NEAREST )
00174 , _glAddressS( ( bindTarget == GL_TEXTURE_2D ) ? GL_REPEAT : GL_CLAMP )
00175 , _glAddressT( ( bindTarget == GL_TEXTURE_2D ) ? GL_REPEAT : GL_CLAMP )
00176 , _redBits( 0 )
00177 , _greenBits( 0 )
00178 , _blueBits( 0 )
00179 , _alphaBits( 0 )
00180 , _luminanceBits( 0 )
00181 , _mipBias( 0 )
00182 , _maxAnisotropy( 1.0f )
00183 , _format( format )
00184 , _type( type )
00185 , _unloadable( true )
00186 , _created( false )
00187 {
00188 
00189 }

00191 //----------------------------------------------------------
00192 GrTextureBase::~GrTextureBase()
00193 {
00195         GrDeleteTexture( _glHandle );
00196         _glHandle = 0;
00197 }

00211 //----------------------------------------------------------
00212 void
00213 GrTextureBase::Bind( unsigned int texUnit )
00214 {
00215         B_ASSERT( texUnit < 16 );
00216         B_ASSERT( _glHandle != 0 );
00217         GrBindTexture( texUnit, _bindTarget, _glHandle );
00218         CHECK_GL();
00219 }
00220 
00221 //----------------------------------------------------------
00222 void
00223 GrTextureBase::Bind( unsigned int texUnit, unsigned int glMinFilter, unsigned int glMagFilter, unsigned int glAddressS,
00224                                         unsigned int glAddressT, float maxAnisotropy, int mipBias )
00225 {
00226         CHECK_GL();
00227 
00228         B_ASSERT( texUnit < 16 );
00229         B_ASSERT( _glHandle != 0 );
00230         B_ASSERT( maxAnisotropy >= 1.0f );
00231         GrBindTexture( texUnit, _bindTarget, _glHandle );
00232         CHECK_GL();
00233 
00234         if ( GetFormat() == EF_DEPTH || GetFormat() == EF_DEPTHSTENCIL )
00235         {
00236                 glMinFilter = GL_NEAREST;
00237                 glMagFilter = GL_NEAREST;
00238         }
00239 
00240         if ( _glMinFilter != glMinFilter )
00241         {
00242                 _glMinFilter = glMinFilter;
00243                 bglTexParameteri( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, glMinFilter );
00244                 CHECK_GL();
00245         }
00246         if ( _glMagFilter != glMagFilter )
00247         {
00248                 _glMagFilter = glMagFilter;
00249                 bglTexParameteri( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, glMagFilter );
00250                 CHECK_GL();
00251         }
00252 
00253         if ( _glAddressS != glAddressS )
00254         {
00255                 _glAddressS = glAddressS;
00256                 bglTexParameteri( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, glAddressS );
00257         }
00258         if ( _glAddressT != glAddressT )
00259         {
00260                 _glAddressT = glAddressT;
00261                 bglTexParameteri( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, glAddressT );
00262         }
00263         if ( _maxAnisotropy != maxAnisotropy )
00264         {
00265                 _maxAnisotropy = maxAnisotropy;
00266                 bglTexParameterf( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_MAX_ANISOTROPY_EXT, maxAnisotropy );
00267         }
00268         if ( ( ( _flags & kNoMipMap ) == 0 ) && _mipBias != mipBias )
00269         {
00270                 _mipBias = mipBias;
00271                 bglTexParameteri( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_LOD_BIAS_EXT, _mipBias );
00272         }
00273 }
00274 
00275 //----------------------------------------------------------
00276 void
00277 GrTextureBase::Unbind()
00278 {
00279         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 15; ++i )
00280         {
00281                 if ( GrGetTexture( i ) == _glHandle )
00282                         GrBindTexture( i, _bindTarget, 0 );
00283         }
00284 }

00286 //----------------------------------------------------------
00287 void
00288 GrTextureBase::AutoGenMipmaps()
00289 {
00291         B_ASSERT( ~_flags & kNoMipMap );
00292 
00294         Bind( 0 );
00295         bglGenerateMipmapEXT( _bindTarget );
00296         CHECK_GL();
00297 }

00299 //----------------------------------------------------------
00300 void
00301 GrTextureBase::Recreate()
00302 {
00303         PreContextReset();
00304         PostContextReset();
00305 }

00307 //----------------------------------------------------------
00308 void
00309 GrTextureBase::PreContextReset()
00310 {
00311         GrDeleteTexture( _glHandle );
00312         _glHandle = 0;
00313 
00314 }
00315 
00316 //----------------------------------------------------------
00317 void
00318 GrTextureBase::PostContextReset()
00319 {
00321         _created = false;
00322         Create();
00323 
00325         bglTexParameteri( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, _glMinFilter );
00326         bglTexParameteri( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, _glMagFilter );
00327         bglTexParameteri( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, _glAddressS );
00328         bglTexParameteri( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, _glAddressT );
00329         bglTexParameterf( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_MAX_ANISOTROPY_EXT, _maxAnisotropy );
00330         bglTexParameteri( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_LOD_BIAS_EXT, _mipBias );
00331 
00333         CHECK_GL();
00334 }

00339 //==========================================================
00340 
00341 //----------------------------------------------------------
00342 void
00343 GrTextureBase::Create()
00344 {
00345         B_ASSERT( _glHandle == 0 );
00346 
00348         _glHandle = GrGenTexture();
00349         Bind( 0 );
00350 
00352         bglTexParameteri( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, _glMinFilter );
00353         bglTexParameteri( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, _glMagFilter );
00354         CHECK_GL();
00355 
00357         if ( _bindTarget == GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB )
00358         {
00359                 bglTexParameteri( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP );
00360                 bglTexParameteri( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP );
00361                 CHECK_GL();
00362         }
00363         else
00364         {
00365                 bglTexParameteri( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, _glAddressS );
00366                 bglTexParameteri( _bindTarget, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, _glAddressT );
00367                 CHECK_GL();
00368         }
00369 
00370         UploadImage( ( _flags & kNoMipMap ) == 0 );
00371         CHECK_GL();
00372 
00373         unsigned int levelBindTarget = _bindTarget;
00374         if ( _bindTarget == GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP )
00375         {
00376                 levelBindTarget = GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X;
00377         }
00378 
00380         bglGetTexLevelParameteriv( levelBindTarget, 0, GL_TEXTURE_RED_SIZE, ( GLint* )&_redBits );
00381         bglGetTexLevelParameteriv( levelBindTarget, 0, GL_TEXTURE_GREEN_SIZE, ( GLint* )&_greenBits );
00382         bglGetTexLevelParameteriv( levelBindTarget, 0, GL_TEXTURE_BLUE_SIZE, ( GLint* )&_blueBits );
00383         bglGetTexLevelParameteriv( levelBindTarget, 0, GL_TEXTURE_ALPHA_SIZE, ( GLint* )&_alphaBits );
00384         bglGetTexLevelParameteriv( levelBindTarget, 0, GL_TEXTURE_LUMINANCE_SIZE, ( GLint* )&_luminanceBits );
00385         CHECK_GL();
00386 
00387         _created = true;
00388 }
00389 
00390 //----------------------------------------------------------
00391 unsigned int
00392 GrTextureBase::GetGLFormat( GrImage* image )
00393 {
00394         EFORMAT format = _format;
00395         if ( format == EF_GUESS )
00396         {
00397                 static EFORMAT guessMap[] =
00398                 {
00399                         EF_RGB24,       
00400                         EF_RGBA32,      
00401                         EF_RGB48F,      
00402                         EF_RGBA64F,     
00403                         EF_I8,          
00404                         EF_I16F,        
00405                         EF_LA16,        
00406                         EF_LA32F,       
00407                         EF_DEPTH,       
00408                 };
00409                 if ( image )
00410                         format = guessMap[ image->GetFormat() ];
00411                 else
00412                         format = EF_RGBA32;
00413         }
00414 
00416         EGRQUALITY texQuality = gGrTextureMgr->GetTexturingQuality();
00417         bool compress = _compressMap[ texQuality ] && !( _flags & kNoCompress ) &&
00418                 _canCompressMap[ format ];
00419 
00421         unsigned int glFormat = 0;
00422         if ( compress )
00423                 glFormat = _compressedInternalFormatMap[ format ];
00424         else
00425                 glFormat = _internalFormatMap[ format ];
00426 
00428         return glFormat;
00429 }
00430 
00431 //----------------------------------------------------------
00432 GrImage*
00433 GrTextureBase::CreateImage( const UPath& name )
00434 {
00436         URef< RFile > file = gRFileMgr->GetFile( name, RFileMgr::kFlagRead );
00437         if ( !file )
00438         {
00441                 return 0;
00442         }
00443 
00445         const void* fileData = file->GetData();
00446         unsigned int size = ( unsigned int )file->GetSize();
00447         if ( !size )
00448                 return 0;
00449 
00451         UReader reader( fileData, size, false );
00452         GrImage* image = new GrImage( name, reader );
00453 
00455         file->Purge();
00456 
00458         return image;
00459 }
